name: Arcadia Theatre Company, Appellant, v. Sablosky, Appellant

judges: Before Bell, C. J., Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien and Roberts, JJ.
parties: Arcadia Theatre Company, Appellant, v. Sablosky, Appellant.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Decree affirmed. Each party to pay own costs.
Mr. Justice Musmanno dissents.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: I. Raymond Kremer, with him Morton Within, for appellants.
Edwin P. Rome, with him Richard M. Rosenbleeth, and Blank, Rudenko, Klaus & Rome, for appellees.
casebody.head_matter:
Arcadia Theatre Company, Appellant, v. Sablosky, Appellant.
Argued April 28, 1966.
Before Bell, C. J., Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien and Roberts, JJ.
I. Raymond Kremer, with him Morton Within, for appellants.
Edwin P. Rome, with him Richard M. Rosenbleeth, and Blank, Rudenko, Klaus & Rome, for appellees.
June 24, 1966:
